segments.text: I can't help but smile at this classic kitchen chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's concentrating hard on that shiny plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are piled up neatly by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running, but she's in her zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is kind of funny, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing at her feet—classic unaware mom moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy climbing for cookies is adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool's tipping, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand deep in the cookie jar—jackpot!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all excited, reaching for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks perfect, like a picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just warms my heart, hazards and all.
segments.speaker: PAR
